channel.title: [BUG] Report bugs here in this category for closed Alpha+
channel.description:
This category (subthread) was renamed to "Bug Reports/Feedback" >> There is also now a bug reporting template:
**If you are reporting feedback and not a bug, just delete the template.** [color=red](**Pro Tip:** CTRL+A >> DEL)[/color]
It'll help if you put [BUG] in the subject if you want it to stand out.
